backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, contact form submissions, and admin panel with role-based access control using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules; includes migration support and defines types for UserProfile, ContactFormSubmission, ProductInterest, and Gender.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldActor state (with admins list) to NewActor state (without admins), preserving userProfiles and submissions data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 15 frontend files including React components, hooks, configuration, and pages for an insurance broker website with Internet Identity authentication and admin panel.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space, including navy, gold, accent-blue, and slate colors for an insurance-themed design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, title for Jonathan Ayan Insurance Broker Website, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router configuration defining homepage (with hero, services, child benefits, companies, contact sections) and admin panel routes, wrapped in QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/ChildBenefitsSec: Section component explaining benefits of child life insurance policies with two feature cards highlighting tax-free wealth building and compounded interest growth, styled with navy gradient background and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection: Section displaying five A+ rated insurance carrier logos (Mutual of Omaha, Transamerica, Ethos, Fidelity and Guaranteed Life, Foresters) plus a "+25 other carriers" card, with explanatory text about independent broker advantages.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation for insurance inquiries, collecting user details (name, state, age, gender, product interest, coverage amount) and preferred contact time/day. Handles form submission via useSubmitContactForm hook with success/error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company information (Equity Insurance Partners, Jonathan Ayan), contact details, services list, copyright notice, and links to admin page and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, professional headshot, main heading for Jonathan Ayan as Life & Annuity Insurance Broker, and call-to-action buttons that scroll to contact section.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity that toggles between login/logout states, handles authentication flow, and clears query cache on logout.
Services section displaying two main offerings (Life Insurance and Annuities) in card format with icons, descriptions, and feature lists for each service type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, identity state, and authentication status with configurable options for idle handling and identity provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile management, admin authorization checks, and contact form submission with actor-based backend communication and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for a professional insurance theme featuring navy blue, gold accents, and light/dark mode support using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page component that checks user authentication and admin status, displays contact form submissions in a table, and handles user profile setup with Principal ID display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom color palette (navy, gold, accent-blue, slate) using OKLCH color space and custom border radius/shadow utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an admin authorization bug where Principal ID '5xjc2-y22qo-6hyhb-cz5mg-dskju-ngytr-slbw7-lwush-4ucbp-glcln-s' is not recognized as admin in production and loses access after canister upgrades.
